title: What is the cheapest, simplest DIY stringed instrument I can make? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would go with a Washtub bass - Wikipedia You can assemble one from fishing line, a nail, a broomsticks and a stiff cardboard box. I actually do not have a stiff cardboard box, but a few limp ones. Stay tuned.😁
“Diddly bow” (one string cigar box guitar) is pretty easy to make, and its portable.
